The Republic therefore hath made a general Ceffion of all her Dominions, and Confederates 3 hath given an Oath to Philip, that you shall oppose whoever presumes to preserve them to her3 that whoever shall attempt to restore thern shall be declared an Enemy, while he, who hath depri- ved her of them, shall be deerned a Confederate and Ally.
